statements: SELECT * FROM policy_info;
SELECT policyholder_name, coverage_limit FROM policy_info WHERE policyholder_age > 30;
SELECT id, policyholder_age FROM policy_info WHERE coverage_limit > 5000;
SELECT * FROM policy_info ORDER BY policyholder_age DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, coverage_limit FROM policy_info WHERE policyholder_age < 40 ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policyholder_age FROM policy_info WHERE policyholder_age > 30 ORDER BY policyholder_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_info WHERE coverage_limit BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY policyholder_name ASC;
SELECT id, policyholder_name, coverage_limit FROM policy_info WHERE policyholder_age < 40 OR coverage_limit > 5000 ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC, policyholder_name ASC;
SELECT policyholder_name, coverage_limit FROM policy_info WHERE policyholder_name LIKE 'J%' OR policyholder_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT DISTINCT policyholder_name, policyholder_age, coverage_limit FROM policy_info WHERE coverage_limit < 3000 ORDER BY policyholder_name DESC, coverage_limit ASC;
SELECT id, name, email, address FROM policyholders;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM policyholders ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage WHERE coverage_limit >= 5000;
SELECT start_date, end_date FROM policy_coverage WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit FROM policy_coverage ORDER BY coverage_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders JOIN policy_coverage ON policyholders.id = policy_coverage.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM policyholder;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM policyholder WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_limit FROM policy WHERE coverage_limit > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claim WHERE claim_amount >= 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM policyholder ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholder ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT policyholder_id, COUNT(policy_id) AS policy_count FROM policy GROUP BY policyholder_id HAVING policy_count > 1
SELECT policyholder.first_name, policy.coverage_limit FROM policy JOIN policyholder ON policy.policyholder_id = policyholder.policyholder_id WHERE policy.coverage_limit > 5000
SELECT MAX(claim_amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM claim
SELECT * FROM policyholder WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31'
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, email FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_type, coverage_limit FROM policies WHERE policy_holder_id = 1;
SELECT p.type_name, cl.max_limit FROM policy_types p JOIN coverage_limits cl ON p.type_id = cl.policy_type_id;
SELECT ph.name, p.policy_type, cl.max_limit FROM policyholders ph JOIN policies p ON ph.id = p.policy_holder_id JOIN coverage_limits cl ON p.policy_type = cl.max_limit;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, email FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT p.policy_type, c.max_limit FROM policies p JOIN coverage_limits c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_type_id;

SELECT ph.name, pt.type_name, cl.max_limit FROM policyholders ph JOIN policies p ON ph.id = p.policy_holder_id JOIN policy_types pt ON p.policy_type = pt.type_name JOIN coverage_limits cl ON pt.type_id = cl.policy_type_id WHERE cl.max_limit > 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT ph.name FROM policyholders ph JOIN policies p ON ph.id = p.policy_holder_id WHERE p.coverage_limit > 10000 ORDER BY ph.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE id = 2;
SELECT policy_name, effective_date, expiration_date FROM policies ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM coverage_limits WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT beneficiary_name, relationship FROM beneficiaries WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1
SELECT policy_name, effective_date, expiration_date FROM policies WHERE policy_id > 100 ORDER BY policy_id DESC
SELECT coverage_type, SUM(coverage_amount) AS total_coverage FROM coverage_limits GROUP BY coverage_type HAVING total_coverage > 1000
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim_history WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT policy_id, beneficiary_name, relationship FROM beneficiaries WHERE relationship = 'Spouse'
